channel.title: Make Admins Drop Items On Death!
channel.description:
Ok so iv been having this problem getting my admins to drop there items on the ground when they die. I have alreddy changed the config to true and they can drop on the ground but not when they die. they also loose all there items correctly just dont drop on the ground.
I am useing cruelalityX version of PI also known as dspk.
Any help would be much appreciated.
Thank you for your time. :)

item.title: Make Admins Drop Items On Death!
item.dc:creator: @II_Jacob_II II Jacob II
item.description:
@II_Jacob_II wrote:

It should be at Src > Server > Config.java
Hit Ctrl + f and search for

You should see something like this:

	public static final boolean ADMIN_CAN_TRADE = false; //can admins trade?
	public static final boolean ADMIN_CAN_SELL_ITEMS = false; // can admins sell items?
	public static final boolean ADMIN_DROP_ITEMS = false; // can admin drop items?

Change all each ‘false’ to true like so and it should work.

	public static final boolean ADMIN_CAN_TRADE = true; //can admins trade?
	public static final boolean ADMIN_CAN_SELL_ITEMS = true; // can admins sell items?
	public static final boolean ADMIN_DROP_ITEMS = true; // can admin drop items?

I hope this works, and helped anyone else that needed it.

Read full topic
item.source: Make Admins Drop Items On Death!
